title: Average player salary in the Bundesliga 2019/20 , by team
yAxis: Average player salary in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average player salary in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Average player salary in million U.S. dollars 8.12 is found at Month Bayern Munich and the minimum is found at Paderborn where Month is 0.42.
The highest value at Month Bayern Munich is 19.33x times more than the lowest value at Paderborn.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player salary in million U.S. dollars for 18 number of Months.
The Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Bayern Munich and lowest at Month Paderborn.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average player salary in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Average player salary in million U.S. dollars 8.12 is found at Month Bayern Munich and the minimum is found at Paderborn where Month is 0.42.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player salary in million U.S. dollars for 18 number of Months.
Month Bayern Munich has the highest Average player salary in million U.S. dollars and Paderborn has the lowest Average player salary in million U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is found at Month Borussia Dortmund.
The highest Month Bayern Munich has 7.7 more Average player salary in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Paderborn.
Month Bayern Munich is higher than any other Months with value 8.12, followed by Borussia Dortmund, and Bayer Leverkusen. Down to Month Paderborn with the lowest value 0.42.
Over the past 18 Months, the Average player salary in million U.S. dollars has reduced.
The Month Paderborn tends to be 3.95 percent lower than average.
The Average player salary in million U.S. dollars is 37.01 if we add up values of all Months.
